full_text:
Widow's Kiss Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
Calvados
3/4
ounce
Yellow Chartreuse
3/4
ounce
Bénédictine
2
dashes
Angostura bitters
Garnish:
cocktail cherry
Directions
Pour Calvados, Chartreuse, Benedictine, and bitters into a mixing glass and fill with ice; stir briskly for 30 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
Special Equipment
Cocktail strainer
Brandy & Cognac
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
